# Test Video Fixtures

Sample video files for testing the AI detection pipeline.

## Files
- `a.avi` - General test video
- `b.mp4` - General test video  
- `fight_0002.mpeg` - Violence detection test
- `fight_0048.mpeg` - Violence detection test

## Usage

```python
# In tests
VIDEO_PATH = "tests/fixtures/videos/fight_0002.mpeg"
```
